content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #243

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by @euvitudo
Chapter/section: Intent Verification Response
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/#subscribing-and-unsubscribing
Type: A-S

Summary:

Comment: What is the rationale for the 404? It doesn't not really convey rejection. Seems that 409 Conflict might be preferable.

Existing wording: If the subscriber does not agree with the action, the subscriber MUST respond with a 404 "Not Found" response.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #243

This is as defined by WebSub:
https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/#verification-details

wmaethner labeled Issue #243

wmaethner commented on Issue #243

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Niklas Svenzen moved the following disposition, seconded by Michael Donnelly

Disposition: Not persuasive
Disposition Comment: We will continue to follow the web sub model which uses 404.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
